class

Static Methods

currency(v : Float, ?symbol : String, ?decimals : Int, ?culture : Culture) : String

decimal(v : Float, ?decimals : Int, ?culture : Culture) : String

digits(v : String, ?culture : Culture) : String

Transforms a string of digit from the international format (0...9) to the locale format. Be sure to include only characters in the 0...9 range.
